definition: Buddhist monastery, temple or shrine (abbr. for 剎多羅, Sanskrit ksetra)
car/vehicle/CL:輛|辆[liang4]/machine/to shape with a lathe/Kangxi radical 159

sentences.english: Do 08 Sailatu still have fog lamp and exalted brake light?
sentences.chinese: 分鐘前更新08款賽拉圖還有霧燈和高位剎車燈嗎？

sentences.english: When the car ahead suddenly flashed brake lights, the human drivers also braked.
sentences.chinese: 當前車突然亮起剎車燈時，人類駕駛員也踩下了剎車。

sentences.english: I'll check the signal lights and brake lights.
sentences.chinese: 我要檢查方向燈和剎車燈。
